source.name: Final critical habitat for the Amargosa vole (Microtus californicus scirpensis)
source.description: Abstract: These data identify the areas (in general) where final critical habitat for the Amargosa vole (Microtus californicus scirpensis) occurs.     Purpose: Critical habitat are areas considered essential for the conservation of a listed species. These areas provide notice to the public and land managers the importance of these areas to the conservation of this species. Special protections and/or restrictions are possible in areas where federal funding, permits, licenses, authorizations, or actions occur or are required.
